document_data.name: Earthchildren
document_data.mainbody: '''Earthchildren''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Geb]], the Father Under the Skies and Sands in the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Activities: As with most of Geb's clergy, earthchildren spent much of their time mining or working with blacksmiths.
document_data.Culture: Most earthchildren were [[human]] though some [[dwarves]] followed this path as well.
document_data.Abilities:
All earthchildren, regardless of their race, could see with [[infravision]] out to at least {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}}. These individuals were incredibly strong and hearty, while at the same time being rather awkward in social situations. They were skilled in mountaineering and similar skills and could detect slopes, grades, traps, pits, and deadfalls like a dwarf.

Earthchildren could cast the following [[spell]]s once per day: ''[[detect metals and minerals]]'', ''[[dust shield]]'', ''[[dig]]'', ''[[conjure earth elemental]]'', ''[[move earth]]'', ''[[earthquake]]'', and ''[[sink]]''
document_data.Possessions: In addition to blunt weapons, some earthchildren used a [[pick]] in combat. Most favored metal [[armor]].
